alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 16 at 3:50PM EDT until March 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible beginning late Friday afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches possible, with locally higher amounts possible closer to Whitefish Point. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Chippewa and Central Chippewa Counties. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and the potential for dangerous travel. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds will lead to areas of drifting snow. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
